item.title: C++ Lambdas and Recursion
item.description: Let me say I want to reverse a sequence of elements. First I’ve to define a function. One definition: int main (void) { // sequence void reverse (vector<int> &arr) { int i = 0, j = arr.size() - 1; while (i < j) { int temp = arr[i]; arr[i++] = arr[j]; arr[j--] = temp; } } // calls reverse return 0; } But you can’t do that in C++.
